rows.label: qst701502_msg0001
rows.name:
As I face the end of my life, my one
regret is a vase I promised to an old
friend that isn't finished yet.

rows.label: qst701502_msg0002
rows.name:
The materials needed for the finish are
two Spiral Mistletoe, four Silverwing
Quartz, and four Eternity Loam. That's all.

rows.label: qst701502_msg0003
rows.name:
If you happen to get them,
it would be a great help
if you could share.

rows.label: qst701502_msg0005
rows.name:
Oh, yes. I've heard that long ago,
you could find a lot of Eternity
Loam in the Loftin Nature Preserve.

rows.label: qst701502_msg0006
rows.name:
It's a precious thing now, so I
don't know if any is left, but I
think it's worth looking for.

rows.label: qst701502_msg0007
rows.name:
Well then, if you happen to find it
while you're doing something else, that
would be fine. I'm counting on you.

rows.label: qst701502_msg0008
rows.name:
Knowing him, I'm sure he's already
forgotten, fufu. But I want to
keep my promise before I go.

rows.label: qst701502_msg0101
rows.name:
He's old, so I don't
think he's gone too far.

rows.label: qst701502_msg0102
rows.name:
...I'm sorry. When I get
anxious, I feel a little dizzy.

rows.label: qst701502_msg0103
rows.name:
It's okay. I've come this far. It
would be pointless to collapse now.

rows.label: qst701502_msg0201
rows.name:
My, that person!? Is he having
trouble breathing... wheezing?

rows.label: qst701502_msg0202
rows.name:
His throat might be inflamed. If
there's no medicine, herbs would
be best in this situation...

rows.label: qst701502_msg0203
rows.name:
There should be one with
anti-inflammatory properties.
It has a nice, cool scent.

rows.label: qst701502_msg0204
rows.name:
Don't laugh at an old woman's simple
wisdom. I'm no doctor, but I haven't
survived this long alone for nothing.

rows.label: qst701502_msg0205
rows.name:
I can't move from here,
but... please, help him.
